short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take care of your eyes day and night using dark theme for Intercom tools and services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The white design of Intercom can be harmful to your eyes if youâ€™re working in dimly-lit conditions. We care about your health, therefore, we introduce an extension for adding a dark theme to your Intercom interface. 

DARK MODE
You can easily switch between light and dark modes and even adjust the contrast and brightness. The theme works across all functions of Intercom, allowing you to concentrate on what matters - your customers.

NIGHT SHIFT FEATURE
The screen of your computer or laptop emits blue light and when exposed for a long time can increase the risk of insomnia. But worse than that, extended exposure to blue light hurts your eyesight. 

Turn on Night Shift to switch cold tones to warm and reduce the probability of health problems caused by electronic devices.
